post: This Thursday, I will have the opportunity to talk about my passion in a podcast for European Commission staff: new ways of organizing, particularly decentralized autonomous organizations. Thank you Joachim Schwerin, my ally in this field and host of this session, and Marjolein Geus as a co-guest.

The United States spends billions of dollars on ICE detention centers each year — most of which are privately owned. We are making it profitable to illegally and unconstitutionally detain immigrants who have been convicted of no crimes and are just waiting for hearings.

Draadje. Deze week heb ik met stijgende verbazing naar de debatten in de Tweede Kamer gekeken. Met uitspraken als ‘onderhandelen met de VS over NAVO-bijdrage en steun voor Oekraïne’ laten politici zien de grootste geopolitieke aardverschuiving in 80 jaar te hebben gemist. 1/?
